name: Death Duty Zombies Killer The Contract

description:
***extreme zombie shooting action in a city of horror, how long you can survive***

Get ready for ultimate zombie killing action. Evil death duty is free to play game where wave of zombie are attacking and coming towards you. Enjoy the feeling of slaying brutal zombies. You are equipped with advanced guns to fight with zombies. Let the zombies die in blackout. Different zombies come with different abilities to check your fighting skills. You will also face zombie boss who look like a horror movie evil to hunt you down. Experience real 3d shooting war as zombie hunter. Be a frontline assassin killer to smash zombies with guns like sniper, assault rifles like ak47 mp5 and machine guns. Act like a commando fighter win like a champion.
How to play:
- Move commando by joystick present left side of your apple mobile.
- Control aim by touching, half right side of screen is dedicated for aiming of your apple device ipad iphone device.
- Tap fire button located at right bottom of your ipad iphone devices.
- Press Zoom to take a close look at zombies.
- Tap on switch gun to switch between guns.
- You can buy bullets and health at run time by tapping on health bar and bullet as per required.
- 8 thrilling missions.
